public class GEHtmlStringBalloon
extends GEHtmlBalloon

The GEHtmlStringBalloon class represents a balloon based on the contentString.

Method Detail

getContentString

public final java.lang.String getContentString()
You can include any HTML using the contentString property. When the balloon is visible, the content specified in contentString property, is inserted directly into the balloon element in the web page.

Returns:
When the balloon is visible, the content specified in contentString property, is inserted directly into the balloon element in the web page.

setContentString

public final void setContentString(java.lang.String contentString)
You can include any HTML using the contentString property. When the balloon is visible, the content specified in contentString property, is inserted directly into the balloon element in the web page.

Parameters:
contentString - You can include any HTML using the contentString property. When the balloon is visible, the content specified in contentString property, is inserted directly into the balloon element in the web page.
